tool_description: Weather listing from around the world
name: Message from the sky
title: Message from the sky

api_list.name: Forecast of a location
api_list.description: Shows the forecast for a given location
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://message-from-the-sky.p.rapidapi.com/forecast?location=Johannesburg"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "message-from-the-sky.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Weather of a location
api_list.description: Retreives the weather data of a given location
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://message-from-the-sky.p.rapidapi.com/weather?location=Johannesburg"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "message-from-the-sky.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
